entry.name: strictEqual
entry.title: strictEqual()

argument.name: message
argument.desc: A short description of the assertion

entry.desc: A strict type and value comparison assertion.

longdesc.p: The strictEqual() assertion provides the most rigid comparison of type and value with the strict equality operator (===.
notStrictEqual() can be used to explicitly test strict inequality.

example.desc: Compare the value of two primitives, having the same value and type.
